verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nammadaginavadavu nemmadini chekurchanu Immahilo yenthainanu nammina nanu gachedi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Alalu gaali thufanulavale sramalu nannilagottina Amaramandu nilchiyesu annitini gaddinchunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Narula rajulanammina nirupayogame yenduna Karamu juchina kashtamulalo korathalanniti theerchunu{/lang-eng}
